data.recommendation: Leverage browsing caching for the cacheble resources
data.content: Every time a browser loads a webpage it has to download all the web files to properly display the page. This includes all the HTML, CSS, JavaScript and images
data.points: Be agreessive with your caching for all static resources
data.points1: Expiry at a minimum of one month (recommended: access plus 1 year), Don't set your caching more than a year in advance!
data.find: Find your .htaccess file in the root of your domain and set our caching parameters to tell the browser what types of files to cache.
